data.title: Some minor fixes
data.body:
- removes duplicate tech center sequence entry in cnc misc.yaml
- brings allied color on temperate shellmap in line with desert shellmap/original RA

data.title: Splits sequences.yaml into multiple files.
data.body: The sequences.yaml is a behemoth, next to impossible to navigate other than through the search function. Splitting it into multiple files named after their category makes navigation easier for everyone.

data.title: Fixes #2216 InstallShield .Z package decompression
data.body:
Reverse engineered pascal code from "STIX", adjusted only a few line of code.
The blast implementation of OpenRA works perfectly with it.
Filename hashing should be removed 'cause of duplicate filenames in nested folders.

data.title: AudLoader: Chunk header is bogus
data.body:
http://pastebin.com/jJuA73KK
Okay i play again in RA mod, and my game was crashed. Scores mix i get from Aftermath version RA, and i play with him always before.
music : Face to the enemy 1

data.title: Spectators can pause the game.

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body: Remove feature for specs?

data.title: LaserZap improvements rev.2
data.body:
-LaserZap Explosion trait renamed to HitAnim
-HitAnim defaults to null instead of laserfire
-BeamRadius replaced with BeamWidth

data.title: Added GPS dot shadows again and removed pixelation
data.body: I was fixing #3319 and while I tried to find the vector image used to generate gpsdot.shp (not available) I cleaned up the artsrc folder from non-helpful legacy junk. This also makes the repository 5 MB lighter.

data.title: Don't auto-target unarmed buildings in RA mod
data.body: Found this old branch when cleaning up my repository. It is the default behavior in RA2.

data.title: Wrong client issues startgame order when all players are ready

milestone.title: June 2013 Playtest
milestone.description: Things that need testing first because they could jeopardize a stable release.

data.body: The bug has been surfaced by #3311. The last client that readied up has been issuing startgame. Now it no longer works because of the order validation.

data.title: Paradrop shadow
data.body:
I noticed this when I tested my crates with shadow, but it applies to infantry (and any other paradropped object too, I guess). as well.

While still in the air, the paradropped object shows a "shadow copy" at the landing destination (which is fine) AS WELL AS any shadow inside the shp moving with the object (which looks awkward).

For new/modified shps, playing a "paradrop" sequence using frames that have the shadow removed would be a way around this issue, but for unmodified TD/RA shps it would be better if the shps' own shadow were not drawn while the object is paradropped.

data.title: Landed helicopters are drawn underneath the helipad

milestone.title: June 2013 Playtest
milestone.description: Things that need testing first because they could jeopardize a stable release.

data.title: Support clockwise-ordered sprite facings
data.body: This is needed for sprite-based vehicles in TS/RA2 (titan, wolverine, terror drone), and D2K.

data.title: Scrub playernames etc to prevent them breaking the LobbyInfo yaml
data.body: Currently you can cause all kinds of fun misbehavior.

data.title: LaserZap improvements
data.body:
Trying to make LaserZap more modder-friendly:
- Explosion defaulting to null instead of laserfire anim
- renaming said Explosion trait to LaserHitAnim
- replacing BeamRadius (2-pixel steps) with BeamWidth (1-pixel steps)

data.title: Oil derrick buff
data.body:
This boosts the incentive to capture and defend oil derricks which is currently pretty non-existent
Fixes #2742

data.title: BridgeLayer NullReferenceException

milestone.title: June 2013 Playtest
milestone.description: Things that need testing first because they could jeopardize a stable release.

data.body:
Version: 20130514.release

data.title: Tiberian Sun nested MIX files are not mounted
data.body: I think OpenRA has trouble mounting mix files inside TIBSUN.MIX at https://github.com/Mailaender/OpenRA/tree/tiberian-sun Not 100% sure about that and I have no clue why this could be the case. My current workaround is mounting folders into which I extracted the packages with XCC Mixer.

data.title: Per tileset/faction packages
data.body: Tiberian Sun uses the same filenames in separate .mix files to differentiate between snow/temperat player buildings and Cabal/EVA announcer voices. We can't apply the file ending priority hacks we are used from RA1/C&C here.

data.title: Norton Antivirus reports OpenRA.Game.exe as malware
data.body:
We are reported as a false positive by Symantec's crappy, but sadly wide-spread used virus scanner:

Reported at:
- http://www.united-forum.de/united-talk-f12/openra-version-20130514-a-112141/#post2738097
- http://forums.cncnz.com/topic/17916-openra-mammoth-may-madness-release/?p=212821

Not sure what we can do about that. Maybe someone who subscribed to them can file a complaint and tell customer support to check our code for whitelisting or fix their heuristic alerts.

data.title: Helicopter graphical glitches on land in groups
data.body:
How to reproduce:

If you click land on a Helipad with a group of Helicopters some will land properly but others do not appear like they should. (central on the helipad)

![screenshot from 2013-05-21 10 46 20 copy](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/4488048/541018/3632f7ba-c1fd-11e2-92cc-4c3fa29e100a.png)

data.title: SAM site appears to wait until heli has crashed before new target
data.body: When the SAM site is fighting multiple helis, it looks as though it waits until the unit it destroyed has fully crashed before finding a new target.

data.title: cnc balance - orca tweaked (improved), sam fix, viceroid
data.body:
Some important changes to cnc. Orca got over-nerfed, and needs a slight boost. 

Its shorter range is an issue since helis are always running into each other and so they can't get a shot off properly. So until that's solved, putting range back at previous level (5).

data.title: CPU usage is high on main menu
data.body:
When I am on the main menu or in the game lobby, my CPU is running at ~90%.

I understand that the game is very CPU-intensive, but why should it take up so much resources when it seems to not be doing anything? (Turning off the shellmap doesn't seem to reduce the cpu consumption). I would like to sit and wait in a game lobby to wait for a game until someone joins and multitask at the same time, but I don't like the high CPU usage.

In the future when there is an IRC client, I might want to stay in a game lobby/IRC chat at the same time. Again, I would not like high CPU usage while I sit there and idle.

data.title: Apollo map creates a lot of lag in the late game
data.body: [Apollo](http://content.open-ra.org/index.php?p=detail&table=maps&id=305) is a huge islands map with limited ore. While it is fun to play the stuttering makes it horrible in the end. @Ripsn thinks that the harvester search logic is driving the path finder nuts creating a similiar problem like bots trying to throw tanks at the player when no direct connection is possible (#2307, #2171, #2007) which seems to be a plausible explanation. How do we fix this?

data.title: several visual improvements
data.body:
Replaces my previous pull request, since my attempts to split that large commit got a little messy, so I decided to start over.

Construction yard with shadow will be added once I finish the make anim. The tank barrels are on hold until I can come up with more satisfying results.

data.title: GPS dot shadows are not remapped and pixelish
data.body: The 2nd time this broke. See #2465. It uses another shadow index than everything else so someone might have forgotten to remap 4 instead of the regular 3 again? Also @pchote noted in IRC that they look ugly pixelish because someone scaled them by 1.5x with pixel doubling.

data.title: The 'Jump to base' hotkey is useless if the Construction Yard is destroyed
data.body:
In some cases, there is a small problem with the "Jump to base" hotkey : 

If you lose your main Construction Yard, you can't use this hotkey anymore...
It would be nice to go back to the barracks, war factory or outpost ?
